headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Transform Races
content: It’s one thing to be able to keep a level head behind the wheel of a sportscar — it’s quite another to pilot a fighter jet. Transform Races require you to do both these things, often while someone else is doing something entirely different. It’s dangerous, and it requires reflexes, intuition, and intelligence to succeed. That’s why all Transform Race competitors will receive 2X GTA$ and RP, all week long.
